title: Israel: an adventure
creator_credit: Israel Government Tourist Office, Nathan Kroll, Alexander Hammid and Franta G. Herman
brief_description: A kaleidoscopic tour of Israel where the past, present and future lie open side by side: Acre, where Jew and Arab work peacefully side by side; the modern city of Haifa with its harbour, industries and big blocks of flats; the Catacombs, Hebrew University; Jerusalem with its churches from many countries and a Yemenite wedding rehearsal. Narrated by Christopher Plummer.
